pr_title: FISH-141 Support Additional Fields with LogRecord when using JsonLogFormatter

timeline.message: FISH-141 Add logging of Map parameter to JSON log formatter

FISH-141 Add test and fix copyright

Signed-off-by: Andrew Pielage <andrew.pielage@payara.fish>

timeline.bodyText: Why not support all parameters as JsonArray and have the Map be a JsonObject within it? If done like this any key within the map will eventually override an existing property.
timeline.author: svendiedrichsen
